rows.label: qst700201_msg0001
rows.name: Mo... No customers at all, mo...

rows.label: qst700201_msg0002
rows.name:
Mo! Welcome, welcome, mo! Welcome
to Obibi's Textiles, mo!

rows.label: qst700201_msg0003
rows.name: Mo? Not a customer, mo?

rows.label: qst700201_msg0004
rows.name:
Obibi is busy, mo! If you're
just looking, go away, mo!

rows.label: qst700201_msg0005
rows.name: Momo? I don't look busy at all, mo?

rows.label: qst700201_msg0006
rows.name: That's none of your business, mo!

rows.label: qst700201_msg0007
rows.name: ...But, you're right, mo.

rows.label: qst700201_msg0008
rows.name:
No customers are coming, and
Obibi is in quite a bind, mo.

rows.label: qst700201_msg0009
rows.name:
For some reason, even other
Nopon seem to stay away.
Business is finished, mo...

rows.label: qst700201_msg0010
rows.name:
Isn't there an idea somewhere for
making a ton of money easily, mo?

rows.label: qst700201_msg0011
rows.name: Mo! That's it, mo!

rows.label: qst700201_msg0012
rows.name:
A moment ago, I saw a Nopon
child I'd never seen around
here before, mo!

rows.label: qst700201_msg0013
rows.name:
A Nopon traveling at that age
must be from the hottest new
trading company in all of Alst...

rows.label: qst700201_msg0014
rows.name: The Voltis Trade Guild, no doubt, mo!

rows.label: qst700201_msg0015
rows.name:
I want you to go right now and ask
that child if they have any ideas
for getting rich quick, mo!

rows.label: qst700201_msg0016
rows.name:
Obibi will wait here while
minding the shop, so I'm
counting on you, mo!

rows.label: qst700201_msg0101
rows.name:
Did you find the little Nopon
from the Voltis Trade Guild, mo?

rows.label: qst700201_msg0102
rows.name:
When Obibi saw them, they were
walking along the path from the
main gate to the back gate, mo!

rows.label: qst700201_msg0103
rows.name:
That child must have a great idea
that will save Obibi's shop, mo!

rows.label: qst700201_msg0201
rows.name:
Did you gather the
materials for the hat, mo?

rows.label: qst700201_msg0301
rows.name:
Amazing, mo! This should
be more than enough, mo!

rows.label: qst700201_msg0302
rows.name:
All right, I'll start
making it right away, mo!

rows.label: qst700201_msg0401
rows.name:
I still need more materials
to make the hat, mo!

rows.label: qst700201_msg0402
rows.name: For the cute-style hat...

rows.label: qst700201_msg0403
rows.name:
I need four Cotton Branches,
two Angel's Sage, and one
Sunflower Rogue, mo!

rows.label: qst700201_msg0404
rows.name: For the casual-style hat...

rows.label: qst700201_msg0405
rows.name:
I'll need four Corkscrew
Creepers, three Panda Pansies,
and one Floral Soil, mo!

rows.label: qst700201_msg0406
rows.name:
These materials can only be found
in either Iira or Gula, so I
need you to search both, mo!
